lead_paragraph: The attack in the violent border city of Ciudad Juárez bore the signs of the drug-related violence that has killed thousands.
snippet: The attack in the violent border city of Ciudad Juárez bore the signs of the drug-related violence that has killed thousands.

headline.main: Gunmen in Mexico Kill 13 at Party
headline.seo: Gunmen Kill 13 at Teenagers’ Party in Mexico
headline.print_headline: Gunmen in Mexico Kill 13 in Attack on a Teenagers’ Party
